attributes.action: Help our servicemen/women receive the same medical treatment that the Prime Minister would receive
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a link to a story on the BBC News website
http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/england/north_yorkshire/6586785.stm
It involves an exserviceman who has served the public for the majority of his life.  He now suffers from a disease which threathens his eyesight but can not receive help until he goes blind in one eye although there is treatment available to help him.

I wonder, if this was a Government Minister, would they have to suffer the same. If the Lord Chancellor is able to spend hundreds of thousands of pounds on decorating his public residence, then £6k is a pittance.
